Name: Shoaib Akhtar
Teams: Pakistan, Asia XI, ICC World XI, Kolkata Knight Riders, Sachin Blasters
Bio: About the worst way to assess Shoaib Akhtar would be to do so through his numbers; they aren't unimpressive but rarely have they revealed so little,From the moment Shoaib emerged on the scene in the late 90s,the world knew it was in for some career,First there was the extreme pace  there was also the attitude; Shoaib was the fastest bowler in the world,he made sure others knew it,He was a natural successor to the legacy of Imran,But that he will end his career an 'if only' or a 'coulda been' is the great tragedy,He had it all  he blew it
